title: Caffe2 throws while enumerating registered operators
body_html:
🐛 Bug

When enumerating registered operator metadata and exception is thrown.

To Reproduce

Steps to reproduce the behavior:

import caffe2.python.core

for name in caffe2.python.core._GetRegisteredOperators():
    print(name)
    op_schema = caffe2.python.workspace.C.OpSchema.get(name)
    if op_schema:
        for output_desc in op_schema.output_desc:
            None

Int8ConvRelu
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "test.py", line 8, in <module>
    for output_desc in op_schema.output_desc:
UnicodeDecodeError: 'utf8' codec can't decode byte 0xa0 in position 0: invalid start byte
  • OS: macOS
  • How you installed PyTorch: pip install torch_nightly -f https://download.pytorch.org/whl/nightly/cpu/torch_nightly.html
  • Python version: 2.7 and 3.7

body:
## 🐛 Bug

When enumerating registered operator metadata and exception is thrown.

## To Reproduce

Steps to reproduce the behavior:

```
import caffe2.python.core

for name in caffe2.python.core._GetRegisteredOperators():
    print(name)
    op_schema = caffe2.python.workspace.C.OpSchema.get(name)
    if op_schema:
        for output_desc in op_schema.output_desc:
            None
```

```
Int8ConvRelu
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "test.py", line 8, in <module>
    for output_desc in op_schema.output_desc:
UnicodeDecodeError: 'utf8' codec can't decode byte 0xa0 in position 0: invalid start byte
```

 - OS: `macOS`
 - How you installed PyTorch: `pip install torch_nightly -f https://download.pytorch.org/whl/nightly/cpu/torch_nightly.html`
 - Python version: `2.7` and `3.7`
